title: Eve Richardson: The Counselor of Light

story.text: Eve Richardson discovers a glowing stone on her way home from her counseling office. The stone gives her the power to hear the hidden pains in people's hearts.
Eve uses her new ability to provide deeper counseling to her clients, helping them unearth and confront deeply buried emotional issues.
During a walk in the park, Eve encounters a robbery. She calms the robber by revealing his unresolved grief, leading to his peaceful surrender.
Word of her powers spreads, and Eve is approached by local authorities to help negotiate in a hostage situation. Her insight resolves the crisis without violence.
Eve holds a community workshop teaching others how to be more empathetic and understanding, using her powers to enhance the experience.
Facing exhaustion, Eve learns to balance her own needs with her desire to help others, taking time to care for herself.
Eve leads a large group session, helping many people find closure with their emotional struggles, solidifying her reputation as a true superhero.

ending: As the sun set on a week of profound impact, Eve realized that true power lies in compassion and empathy.
moral: Helping others heal is a superpower in its own right.
